00012 import numpy as nx
00013 
00014 # Construct a simple graph--typically this data will be loaded
00015 if False:
00016     x = nx.array([1,2,3,4,5,6],'d')
00017     y = nx.array([4,5,6,5,4,5],'d')
00018     dy = nx.array([0.2, 0.3, 0.1, 0.2, 0.9, 0.3])
00019 else:
00020     x = nx.linspace(0,1.,10000)
00021     y = nx.sin(2*nx.pi*x*2.8)
00022     dy = nx.sqrt(100*nx.abs(y))/100
00023 #put data in container--this will typically be done by gui widget
00024 data1 = Data1D(x,y,dy=dy)
00025 data1.xaxis('distance', 'm')
00026 data1.yaxis('time', 's')
00027 data2 = Theory1D(x,y,dy=dy)
00028 #put the data in the graph container
00029 graph=frame.matplotlibController.graph
00030 graph.title('Walking Results')
00031 graph.add(data1)
00032 graph.add(data2)
00033 
00034 # render the data onto the plot
